name: .PRO4PLX File Extension
summary: Learn about .PRO4PLX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Multimedia package created by ProPresenter, a church worship service presentation preparation application; saves a playlist of audio, video, and .PRO4 files and also includes the audio and video files themselves; enables presentations to be archived or transferred between computers.

content: PRO4PLX files are similar to .PRO4PL files, but PRO4PL files do not contain the audio and video files in the bundle.
NOTE: PRO4PLX files can be used interchangeably between the Mac and Windows versions of ProPresenter.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
